akn:section.akn:heading: Consistency with the Federal Acquisition Regulation and departmental policies and directives

akn:content.akn:p: § 563e. Consistency with the Federal Acquisition Regulation and departmental policies and directives The Administrator shall execute the responsibilities set forth in this part in a manner consistent with, and not duplicative of, the Federal Acquisition Regulation and the Department’s policies and directives. (Pub. L. 107–296, title XVI, § 1616, as added Pub. L. 113–245, § 3(a), Dec. 18, 2014, 128 Stat. 2877.)
